review: I want to extend my heartfelt gratitude for the outstanding care I received during my dental treatment. His talkative nature, expertise and professionalism during my wisdom tooth extraction and 11 dental fillings made the entire process smooth and stress-free. it is truly worth every penny that you will pay there. His kindness and attention to detail were greatly appreciated. He truly made my Journey to United states of America hustle free and stress-free.

review: The treatment is literally pain free and the doctor’s friendliness and true guidance towards the patient is very much appreciable

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I went there for teeth straightening. It was a my first experience with any dentist. 
Doctor is very friendly, he answers all your questions/doubts be it any number of time you ask. He explains the entire treatment in a very easy understandable language.
My treatment was 10 months long, i started seeing the difference in my teeth within first two months. All the 25 visits were great, with i asking multiple questions everytime.

I highly recommend this doctor for any of your dental issue or cleaning or whitening etc ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I first visited Dr. Ashish in 2010 with a severe toothache and just days before an international work trip. As with many people the only kinda doctors that petrified me were dentists! All that changed when I met this super soft and understanding doctor. He makes sure that I understand what the problem and the treatment he has planned- and more so he makes sure I am comfortable and at ease when they are performed. From being a girl who would always have her mum accompany her for all dental treatments to happily strolling in the clinic all alone showcases how much the doctor has contributed to overcome all the fear and anxiety ! His hands are so light that I hardly ever feel any pain - weather its drilling or injections.
PS: he is the only doctor who cares about your treatments more than yourself. He takes it upon him to call/text and make sure you complete the treatment on time and follows up for every visit.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
Things you looks for in a dentist:
1. Good experience - explanation of the issue
2. Steady hand - treatment of the issue
3. Great conversations - keeps the nervousness away
4. Correct advice - builds trust
5. Price - should be value for money and not a rip-off

Dr. Aashish stands 5/5 for all the above.

Details about my Dental issue/ Treatment:
Issue - Mild to moderate pain in left lower jaw and cheek
Diagnosis - Lower wisdom tooth not having enough space and upper jaw resting on cheek resulting in cheek-bite.
Treatment - Was suggested to not get it extracted and the pain wasn't severe. Gel and tablet should help allay the pain.

Got the general cleanup and scaling done.

Overall experience - Clearly, one of the better dentists I have been to.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Ashish is a super friendly doctor who takes great care of his patients. He has been my dentist now for close to a decade and I only have good things to say about his attitude, technique and his professionalism. He talks to his patients even after his work on them to make sure they feel alright even after thier dental work.
With respect to my recent tooth extraction experience, I got 2 of my wisdom teeth removed at his clinic(1 surgical) and it was a relatively pain free experience overall. I would recommend Dr. Ashish to everyone just like I have done with my family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

His kindness and attention to detail were greatly appreciated. He truly made my Journey to United states of America hustle free and stress-free.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Aashish is one of the most caring doctors I have had the pleasure of knowing recently. He is incredible and lovely to speak with. It's rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touch and care for their patients. I find that doctors usually are distracted or rushed when visiting their patients, but that's not the case with Dr. Aashish. He has a very holistic approach towards his treatment. He listens, cares, and treats his patients with his impressive demeanour and intuitiveness. He does not sell products that you don't need. He is also very flexible with his treatments, schedules and is always available for his patients via a call or a message, which is rare and much appreciated. His clinic is clean, well equipped and comfortable with friendly staff.Thank you for everything Doctor Aashish. May you continue to be a blessing to all your patients and spread gorgeous smiles.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been visiting Dr. Aashish for my dental treatments and regular follow-ups for past 3 years. The best part about every visit is that you are greeted by ever energetic and smiling doctor. He explains the patient about the process which would be followed before the procedure. 
I have undergone 3 root canals, 1 dental crown and a lot of dental fillings. I don't hesitate to state that I have the received the best dental treatment from him. My mom, who is slightly nervy when it comes to dental treatments, was so relaxed by doctor's words. I would highly recommend Dr. Aashish Tiwari if you want genuine advice and best dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was very busy in my sister's wedding function and it was like I had no time for visiting dentist for tooth cleaning, my family doctor dr.alpesh dedia referred me to visit dr.aashish tiwari for cleaning and I visited him... it was Very first time we met but I felt we knew each other from long time because of the friendly nature of dr.aashish . I told him that I don't have time to visit clinic at every 7 days for 3 times...he understood my problems and did the treatment as per my time..which results in time saving and I was very Delighted by his behaviour.after that I referred his name to all my friends and family ... I surely will visit him as get time to thank him for his efforts and trustworthy behavior.. great doctor.. and helpful staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was one of the most scariest person ever to visit a dentist. I always had a nightmare with the thought of visiting a dentist. But Doctor Aashish changed my view completely about it. My experience with him has been tremendously smooth and successful. God has not only blessed him with a friendly nature but also with the softest hands on his treatments. I didn’t realize the pain in any of my session where I would just close my eyes as I would be scared and let him do his job. His explanation about every step he would do for my treatment made my fearful journey very easy. I would definitely recommend everyone to this amazing doctor...Thank you so much doctor for relieving me from my dental pain as well as the fear of a dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Treatment was smooth and very efficient. The way the doctor communicates puts the patient at ease. Clean surroundings.

review: Explained the issue very well, polite and friendly. Would highly recommend, getting my dental cleaning and cavity issue resolved.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor was super friendly,almost felt like family.The treatment went very smooth and did not come across any problems.Definitely would recommend.

tags: None
review: Initially I had a preset mind that going to a dentist is very painful but all my fears came to an end when I visited Dr. Aashish...not only I was greeted so cheerfully but I was explained each procedure well before he began which I really appreciated. No one can miss out experiencing his gentle touch and the graceful way he does dental treatment. Highly recommended for everyone who wants perfection with gentle hands and yes the graceful and very friendly staff.. Keep it up doc !! Its a pleasure to have found your clinic for all my dental problems !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Ashish has become my go-to dentist in just one visit. I visited him when I was in too much pain due to the eruption of top left wisdom tooth which was cutting my cheek. And second time for the bottom right wisdom tooth. The doctor hardly took 30 seconds to take out the tooth after giving anesthesia, both the times. Not only did he make me understand the whole treatment I've to go through beforehand, but also explained the do's and don'ts afterwards. Ashish is really patient and careful of the patient's psychological fear about visiting a dentist. Believe it or not, I did not take even a single pain killer after the tooth extraction. Definitely recommend to visit him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Ashish is one of a kind. He explains every li'l detail related to your tooth problems & gives options which are all effective in their own way, from which you can decide what you're comfortable with. He's super doctor friendly, so from a 6 year old child to a 70 year old adult, anyone who visits him is in great hands.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor is very friendly and is extremely patient. He explains the issue clearly. Treatment may take a long time as multiple sittings are required.  Only area of concern  is it's pricey for few treatments than other clinics and not everyone can afford it. Apart from that, the doctor is amazing!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Ashish Tiwari is throughly professional. I had a time constraint of getting my teeth aligned. Even though I was not able to call him and schedule appointments due to my constant travelling, he would contact me and make sure I turn up for my appointments because we had a time period of only four months to get teeth aligned. I'm done with the period of braces and now I only have to put retainer which is transparent and my teeth are perfectly aligned. So great job. Very satisfied with the work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is really very good dentist. He is honest in explaining the problem. He is really very friendly. My kids enjoys with him during the treatment and don't have any fear sitting on dentist chair. He is always on time. He never keep us waiting for long time* ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ************ All the very best to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He works patiently with the patient and takes each step after patients satisfaction over doubts. I have been visiting here for last 2 yrs...he does not make monetary benefits like other dentists I tried. He does what he feels is most suitable for the patient...in today's time such doctors are really needed. Have patience that's all I can say and leave rest upto him. Lastly....he takes lot of care while.opersting anything so that patient Shud be completely comfortable.
